marklogic.body:
W T F is wrong with Obama's brain?
OBAMA LIES, COAL AND OIL DIES.
This P O S k i l l s oil exploration and drilling Off the Atlantic coast for another FIVE years, Americans are Bleeding at the pumps AS A DIRECT RESULT OF HIS INSANE ATTACKS on coal and oil for the past three years and three months.
Obama is a SOCIOPATH, this is not disputed by any of his advisers or his supporters.
Now, I am genuinely concerned about his mental stability, and I am starting to see parallels between his actions, and the actions of A dolph H itler in the waning days of his grasp on the reigns of power in Germany.
When H itler felt the German people had betrayed him, that they no longer loved him or believed in him, he turned his wrath on the German people with a "scorched" earth policy.
I feel that this is what Obama has planned for America.
